fields.value: Replication Data for "Dixie's Drivers: Core Values and the Southern Republican Realignment"

dsDescriptionValue.value: This Dataverse Dataset contains the article data and code necessary to reproduce the Journal of Politics articled entitled "Dixie's Drivers: Core Values and the Southern Republican Realignment," co-authored by Robert N. Lupton and Seth C. McKee.  All analyses featured in this article were conducted using Stata 15.

keywordValue.value: Core values, partisanship, South, Southern Realignment

files.description: This Stata dataset represents the 1992-1997 ANES Merged File, which we recode in order to analyze 1992-96 panel data.
files.label: 1992-1997 ANES Merged File.dta

dataFile.filename: 1992-1997 ANES Merged File.dta
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset represents the 1992-1997 ANES Merged File, which we recode in order to analyze 1992-96 panel data.

files.description: This Stata dataset contains the recoded 92-96 ANES panel data that we analyze in our manuscript.
files.label: 1992-94-96 ANES Panel Data Analysis Data.tab

dataFile.filename: 1992-94-96 ANES Panel Data Analysis Data.tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset contains the recoded 92-96 ANES panel data that we analyze in our manuscript.

files.description: This Stata do file features code used to analyze the merged Stata dataset combining the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) (“Analysis Dataset” #11) and 2016 ANES (“Analysis Dataset” #12) that incorporates presidential and congressional vote choice from 1988 to 2016 (“Analysis Dataset” #13).  This do file produces supplemental online appendix Tables A7-8 and Figures A6-7.
files.label: 1992-94-96 ANES Panel Data Analysis.do

dataFile.filename: 1992-94-96 ANES Panel Data Analysis.do
dataFile.description: This Stata do file features code used to analyze the merged Stata dataset combining the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) (“Analysis Dataset” #11) and 2016 ANES (“Analysis Dataset” #12) that incorporates presidential and congressional vote choice from 1988 to 2016 (“Analysis Dataset” #13).  This do file produces supplemental online appendix Tables A7-8 and Figures A6-7.

files.description: This Stata dataset represents the 2016 ANES, which we recode to create a smaller analysis dataset that we merge with the ANES Cumulative File.
files.label: 2016 ANES.tab

dataFile.filename: 2016 ANES.tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset represents the 2016 ANES, which we recode to create a smaller analysis dataset that we merge with the ANES Cumulative File.

files.description: This Stata dataset represents our primary article analysis dataset.
files.label: Analyzing Partisan Change in the South and Non-South, 1988-2016 ANES Data (JOP Revision).tab

dataFile.filename: Analyzing Partisan Change in the South and Non-South, 1988-2016 ANES Data (JOP Revision).tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset represents our primary article analysis dataset.

files.description: This Stata dataset represents the recoded and merged ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) (#11) and 2016 ANES (#12) datasets that incorporates presidential and congressional vote choice from 1988 to 2016.
files.label: Analyzing Partisan Change Plus Vote Choice Using the ANES Cumulative File, 1988-2012 ANES Plus the 2016 ANES.tab

dataFile.filename: Analyzing Partisan Change Plus Vote Choice Using the ANES Cumulative File, 1988-2012 ANES Plus the 2016 ANES.tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset represents the recoded and merged ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) (#11) and 2016 ANES (#12) datasets that incorporates presidential and congressional vote choice from 1988 to 2016.

files.description: This Stata dataset replicates the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) dataset featured above (#2), although this dataset is additionally recoded to include respondents’ presidential and congressional vote choice in 2016.  We merge these recoded data with identically recoded data from the 2016 ANES.
files.label: Analyzing Partisan Change Plus Vote Choice Using the ANES Cumulative File (1988-2012 ANES).tab

dataFile.filename: Analyzing Partisan Change Plus Vote Choice Using the ANES Cumulative File (1988-2012 ANES).tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset replicates the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) dataset featured above (#2), although this dataset is additionally recoded to include respondents’ presidential and congressional vote choice in 2016.  We merge these recoded data with identically recoded data from the 2016 ANES.

files.description: This Stata dataset represents the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012), which we merge with the 2016 ANES.
files.label: Analyzing Partisan Change Using the ANES Cumulative File (1988-2012 ANES).tab

dataFile.filename: Analyzing Partisan Change Using the ANES Cumulative File (1988-2012 ANES).tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset represents the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012), which we merge with the 2016 ANES.

files.description: The first Stata dataset appearing in this Dataverse Dataset is the American National Election Studies (ANES) Cumulative File (1948-2012), which serves as the larger dataset from which subsequent analysis datasets are constructed.
files.label: ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012).dta

dataFile.filename: ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012).dta
dataFile.description: The first Stata dataset appearing in this Dataverse Dataset is the American National Election Studies (ANES) Cumulative File (1948-2012), which serves as the larger dataset from which subsequent analysis datasets are constructed.

files.description: This Stata dataset contains the estimated coefficient for the multiplicative interaction term involving region (South) and egalitarianism in a model predicting partisanship in each year separately from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”
files.label: Coefficient for the Interaction Between Egalitarianism and Time, 1988-2016 ANES.tab

dataFile.filename: Coefficient for the Interaction Between Egalitarianism and Time, 1988-2016 ANES.tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset contains the estimated coefficient for the multiplicative interaction term involving region (South) and egalitarianism in a model predicting partisanship in each year separately from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”

files.description: This Stata dataset contains the estimated correlation between egalitarianism and partisanship among southerners and non-southerners in each year from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”
files.label: Correlation between Egalitarianism and Partisanship (1988-2016 ANES).tab

dataFile.filename: Correlation between Egalitarianism and Partisanship (1988-2016 ANES).tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset contains the estimated correlation between egalitarianism and partisanship among southerners and non-southerners in each year from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”

files.description: This Stata dataset contains the estimated correlation between racial resentment and partisanship among southerners and non-southerners in each year from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is similarly featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”
files.label: Correlation between Racial Resentment and Partisanship (1988-2016 ANES).tab

dataFile.filename: Correlation between Racial Resentment and Partisanship (1988-2016 ANES).tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset contains the estimated correlation between racial resentment and partisanship among southerners and non-southerners in each year from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is similarly featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”

files.description: This Stata do file represents the primary article do file.  This do file analyzes the merged Stata dataset entitled “Analyzing Partisan Change in the South and Non-South, 1988-2016 ANES Data (JOP Revision).dta,” and it features code used to produce manuscript Table 2 and Figures 1-5, as well as supplemental online appendix Tables 1-6 and 9-17, as well as supplemental online appendix Figures 1-5 and 8.
files.label: Dixie's Drivers JOP Article Do File.do

dataFile.filename: Dixie's Drivers JOP Article Do File.do
dataFile.description: This Stata do file represents the primary article do file.  This do file analyzes the merged Stata dataset entitled “Analyzing Partisan Change in the South and Non-South, 1988-2016 ANES Data (JOP Revision).dta,” and it features code used to produce manuscript Table 2 and Figures 1-5, as well as supplemental online appendix Tables 1-6 and 9-17, as well as supplemental online appendix Figures 1-5 and 8.

files.description: This  Stata dataset contains the mean value of the egalitarianism scale for both the South and non-South in each year from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”
files.label: Egalitarianism Mean Values by Party Conditioned on Region and Year (1988-2016 ANES).tab

dataFile.filename: Egalitarianism Mean Values by Party Conditioned on Region and Year (1988-2016 ANES).tab
dataFile.description: This  Stata dataset contains the mean value of the egalitarianism scale for both the South and non-South in each year from 1988 to 2016.  The code used to produce these estimates is featured in the primary analysis Stata do file, entitled “Dixie’s Drivers JOP Article Do File.”

files.description: This Stata do file features code used to analyze the merged Stata dataset combining the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) (“Analysis Dataset” #11) and 2016 ANES (“Analysis Dataset” #12) that incorporates presidential and congressional vote choice from 1988 to 2016 (“Analysis Dataset” #13).  This do file produces supplemental online appendix Tables A7-8 and Figures A6-7.
files.label: Partisan Change Plus Vote Choice (1988-2016 ANES).do

dataFile.filename: Partisan Change Plus Vote Choice (1988-2016 ANES).do
dataFile.description: This Stata do file features code used to analyze the merged Stata dataset combining the recoded ANES Cumulative File (1948-2012) (“Analysis Dataset” #11) and 2016 ANES (“Analysis Dataset” #12) that incorporates presidential and congressional vote choice from 1988 to 2016 (“Analysis Dataset” #13).  This do file produces supplemental online appendix Tables A7-8 and Figures A6-7.

files.description: This README file provides information regarding the data and analysis files, as well as the codebook, located in this Dataverse Dataset that can be used to reproduce the empirical analyses presented in our Journal of Politics article. We hope that this information is helpful, and please do not hesitate to contact the corresponding author if you have any questions regarding these materials.
files.label: README File.pdf

dataFile.filename: README File.pdf
dataFile.description: This README file provides information regarding the data and analysis files, as well as the codebook, located in this Dataverse Dataset that can be used to reproduce the empirical analyses presented in our Journal of Politics article. We hope that this information is helpful, and please do not hesitate to contact the corresponding author if you have any questions regarding these materials.

files.description: This Stata dataset represents the recoded 2016 ANES.  We merge this dataset into the ANES Cumulative File before conducting our empirical analyses.
files.label: Recoded 2016 ANES Data.tab

dataFile.filename: Recoded 2016 ANES Data.tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset represents the recoded 2016 ANES.  We merge this dataset into the ANES Cumulative File before conducting our empirical analyses.

files.description: This Stata dataset replicates the recoded 2016 ANES dataset featured above (#4), although this dataset is additionally recoded to include respondents’ presidential and congressional vote choice in 2016.  We merge this dataset into the similarly recoded ANES Cumulative File (#11) before conducting our supplemental vote choice analyses.
files.label: Recoded 2016 ANES Plus Vote Choice.tab

dataFile.filename: Recoded 2016 ANES Plus Vote Choice.tab
dataFile.description: This Stata dataset replicates the recoded 2016 ANES dataset featured above (#4), although this dataset is additionally recoded to include respondents’ presidential and congressional vote choice in 2016.  We merge this dataset into the similarly recoded ANES Cumulative File (#11) before conducting our supplemental vote choice analyses.

files.description: This Stata do file recodes the 2016 ANES, producing the Stata dataset entitled “Recoded 2016 ANES Data.dta” (“Analysis Dataset” #4).
files.label: Recoding the 2016 ANES.do

dataFile.filename: Recoding the 2016 ANES.do
dataFile.description: This Stata do file recodes the 2016 ANES, producing the Stata dataset entitled “Recoded 2016 ANES Data.dta” (“Analysis Dataset” #4).

files.description: This Stata do file recodes the 2016 ANES dataset incorporating presidential and congressional vote choice (“Analysis Dataset” #12).
files.label: Recoding the 2016 ANES Plus Vote Choice.do

dataFile.filename: Recoding the 2016 ANES Plus Vote Choice.do
dataFile.description: This Stata do file recodes the 2016 ANES dataset incorporating presidential and congressional vote choice (“Analysis Dataset” #12).
